data.text: @Hk06904477 @NikosDendias Turkey should stop sending those poor souls to drown in the aegean sea and instead use the money EU gives you to give them food and shelter

@NikosDendias Turkish armed drones changed the course of the war in Ukraine, the Russian army suffered great losses

https://t.co/hKiXzaPN3V

@NikosDendias Only sympathizes with the people of Ukraine. Unfortunately EU heart does not burn for Afghan refugees. Aren't Afghan human beings? Afghan refugees do not have the right to allow Afghans to enter the EU& open borders for the sake of humanity,it is discrimination against Afghans.
